mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE account = #{account} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (account, password, name, nickname) VALUES (#{user.account}, #{user.password}, #{user.name}, #{user.nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE account = #{account} AND password = #{password} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET nickname = #{user.nickname}, profession = #{user.profession}, gender = #{user.gender}, content = #{user.content}, image_url = #{user.imageUrl}, is_auth = #{user.isAuth} WHERE id = #{user.id} AND is_deleted = 0;

choose.when: SELECT id, name, profession, image_url as imageUrl FROM user ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 7;

choose.otherwise: SELECT id, name, nickname, profession, image_url as imageUrl FROM user WHERE id in ( SELECT followed_user_id FROM follow group by followed_user_id ) ORDER BY rand() LIMIT 9;
